review: so far so good. setup took longer than i liked. something hiccuped and i just had to redo the initial connection 3-4x. streams well from chrome browser/laptop and iphone 6 apps. picture and sound are good. disconnects every so often. reconnecting is quick. sometimes it goes hours without disconnecting, sometimes it disconnects 20 minutes later. i think it has to do with the number of devices connected to the router. (household has 3 laptops, game console, 2 tablets, and phones). so all the wifi traffic may be a variable. i dont blame the chromecast but i do see upgrades in the technology for future releases.
